795650.name: Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn: Soundtrack and Art Book
795650.description:
Enjoy the atmospheric music composed by William Sahl for Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn while taking a look in the official Art book containing everything you need to know about the game.

Artbook.

Take a sneak peek into the production of Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn with this 71 page digital art book containing:

  • The stories that is the foundation of Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn
  • Info on the creative process of the environments
  • Short info and close-ups of all the featured creatures from the Swedish folklore
  • All the paintings, poems and posters from the game in high-res.

All the text in the Art Book is in English!

The tracklist for the high quality Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn OST in MP3 and flac:

  • 1. Unforgiving
  • 2. What Is This Place
  • 3. The Swamp
  • 4. Näcken Theme
  • 5. Giant Encounter
  • 6. Lyktgubbarna
  • 7. Don't Startle The Giant
  • 8. Chased
  • 9. Brother
  • 10. Watch Your Back
  • 11. Fire and Blood
  • 12. She Is Coming
  • 13. Eye and Tongue
  • 14. Over The Lake
  • 15. He Is Coming
  • 16. The Cave
  • 17. Something Is Here
  • 18. The Mother
  • 19. Finders Keepers
  • 20. Trolls
  • 21. Hallway Chase
  • 22. Nightmare
  • 23. Wake Up
  • 24. A Northern Hymn

Song files and Art Book will be placed in your Unforgiving folder in the Steam directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn\DLC - OST and Art Book
795650.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
